conversation.message: Being here in deployment makes me feel so isolated. It’s hard to communicate without the extra charges.
I understand; it must be really tough for you.
It’s just that every call is so expensive. Could you help cover the cost? I’ll make it up to you when I get back.
Yes, I’ll send you some money so we can keep talking.
Thank you, darling. You’re my lifeline in all this.
Anything for you. Just stay safe.
I will, knowing I have you waiting for me.
I’ll be here for you no matter what.
